Message.Title: the whiny billionaires rake in billions while pumping austerity and the sequester
Message.Msg: Whiny Billionaires in Need of Sequestration By Robert Scheer .."The suddenly increased national debt is primarily the result of a deep recession caused by the top bankers and hedge fund hustlers of Wall Street, saved from their folly by massive and costly federal intervention. The result has been a season of obscene profit for them, while the rest of the nation has floundered. But instead of making the rich pay, ordinary citizens will be visited with job furloughs and a savaging of public services that often are lifesaving." Message.Title: restore progressive taxation! and return to the top tax rates of the Eishenhower years
Message.Msg: Now the tax payer who rakes in $450 million or $45 million pays the same rate as the one making $450 thousand. .... In 1955 the IRS took 51.2% of the top 400 incomes.......Recently the top 400 have paid just 16.6% on an astounding average income of $345 million. Eishenhower saw high taxes on high incomes as an antidote to the "opulence" that leads a nation to "depravity and ultimate destruction".....In the Ike years incomes over $400K faced a 91% rate

Topic.Title: The top 1% make 19% of the income and pay 38% of all taxes, yet that's not progressive.....

Message.Msg: I agree hat the idiots on the left don't have a clue as to exactly how progressive the income taxes really are. The moron calling for the Ike era rates has little to no idea as to whabha even means. Once the tax hikes the GOP agreed to in January kick in, the EFFECTIVE rate (ie, the real rate paid) for the top tier of taxpayers will be the same as that paid back in the days of 70% tax rates (in fact, it will be ever-so-slightly higher). So how much do the socialists among us expect us to pay? How about it ----- stand up, be counted, and give us a number.
